name: D∩NE
description:
2021 Epic MegaJam submission

Theme: Running out of space

Escape from the sands on your ship. Hook scraps and build defenses from enemy raiders. Live as longer as you can. You can play alone or with your friend.

Multiplayer ready!

Controls: ActionPlayer 1Player 2MoveWASDGamepad Left Stick / ArrowUseSpaceGamepad A / Num 0HookLMBGamepad X / Num . Team:

Enka
Alex Vinogradov
IcecreamPeppery
Alex Gertsev
Dmitriy Ovsyannikov

Music by Valentin Timoshin
